
                            
                            <p>说是老用户才能参加，过去90天在超市、便利店、水果、生鲜、鲜花和各种专卖店下过3单的才行。还是老地方，还是4个助力。<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/082817uglilpzlli5hugp1.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/25/082817uglilpzlli5hugp1.jpg"> </p>
